text: Khe Sanh can refer to several topics: ==Places== * Khe Sanh, district capital of Hướng Hoá District, Quảng Trị Province, Vietnam * Khe Sanh Combat Base, was a United States Marine Corps outpost south of the Vietnamese Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) used during the Vietnam War ==Other uses== * "Khe Sanh" (song), a song by Cold Chisel * Battle of Khe Sanh, a 1968 battle during the Vietnam War ==See also== * Kaesong, a city in North Korea * Kajang, a city in Malaysia * Que Son Valley, a valley in Quảng Nam Province
title: Khe Sanh (disambiguation)
